name: Lubriderm Fragrance Free Daily Moisture Lotion
description: Dermatologist-developed moisturizing lotion with Pro-Ceramide, Shea Butter & Glycerin for sensitive skin
longDescription:
Lubriderm Fragrance Free Daily Moisture Lotion is a dermatologist-developed formula that delivers clinically proven 24-hour moisture for healthier-looking skin. Enriched with Pro-Ceramide, Shea Butter, and Glycerin, this gentle yet effective lotion helps restore your skin's essential moisture while strengthening its natural barrier. The non-greasy, fast-absorbing formula is ideal for daily use on face, hands, and body, making it a versatile addition to any skincare routine.

Specially formulated for sensitive skin, this fragrance-free lotion is non-comedogenic and won't clog pores. It absorbs quickly without leaving any sticky residue behind, allowing you to get dressed immediately after application. The dermatologist-tested formula is gentle enough for everyday use while providing the deep hydration your skin needs.

With its pump dispenser and generous 24 fl. oz size, this lotion offers convenient, economical skincare for the entire family. Perfect for dry winter months or year-round hydration, Lubriderm Fragrance Free Daily Moisture Lotion keeps your skin feeling soft, smooth, and naturally healthy day after day.

features.title: Pro-Ceramide Technology
features.description: Contains essential lipids naturally found in healthy skin that help strengthen your skin's moisture barrier and prevent water loss for long-lasting hydration.

features.title: Enriched with Shea Butter
features.description: Premium shea butter deeply nourishes skin, improving elasticity and providing intensive moisture for even the driest areas without feeling heavy or greasy.

features.title: Glycerin-Infused Formula
features.description: Natural humectant glycerin attracts moisture to the skin and locks it in, creating a protective layer that keeps skin hydrated throughout the day and night.

features.title: Sensitive Skin Friendly
features.description: Fragrance-free, non-comedogenic formula is dermatologist tested and specially developed for sensitive skin, providing gentle care without irritation.

pros: Fast-absorbing formula leaves no greasy residue
Provides 24-hour moisture in a single application
Versatile for use on face, hands, and body
Economical large 24 fl. oz size with convenient pump
Helps strengthen skin's natural moisture barrier
No sticky or tacky feeling after application
cons: May be too lightweight for extremely dry skin conditions
Some users may prefer a scented option (though fragrance-free is ideal for sensitive skin)
Not specialized for specific skin concerns like eczema
May need more frequent application in very dry climates
